channel.title: Server Ideas?
channel.description: What is are some good ideas for a server? Like...Teleport locations, commands, and stuff like that...I need some stuff because Im stuck on what to add...

item.title: Server Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

commands is last thing u want to think about…COMMANDS ARE LAME (keep that in mind)…plus commands u should only be thinking about when you NEED them for like a quest or something…or banning etc. Add some quests.

Read full topic
